==Professor Decimus Phostle==
==Professor Decimus Phostle==

:In French: [[:fr:Professeur Calys]]

[[Image:Herge Phostle.jpg|thumb|left|Professor Decimus Phostle, the astronomer]]
[[Image:Herge Phostle.jpg|thumb|left|Professor Decimus Phostle, the astronomer]]
Professor Decimus Phostle appeared in ''[[The Shooting Star]]'' as the director of an [[observatory]] whom Tintin consulted about a large bright star he saw in [[Ursa Major]]. Phostle claimed that it was a ball of fire which would hit the Earth and cause the end of the world ! He calculated that it would occur at 8.12Â½ a.m. the following morning. Phostle actually appeared to look forward to this, thinking that predicting the end of mankind would make him famous!
Professor Decimus Phostle appeared in ''[[The Shooting Star]]'' as the director of an [[observatory]] whom Tintin consulted about a large bright star he saw in [[Ursa Major]]. Phostle claimed that it was a ball of fire which would hit the Earth and cause the end of the world ! He calculated that it would occur at 8.12Â½ a.m. the following morning. Phostle actually appeared to look forward to this, thinking that predicting the end of mankind would make him famous!
